content: the möbius linen stitch cowl is the first crochet along of 2020 at the twisted skein in bakersfield ca we created this pattern with the intention of allowing you to use any yarn you like while creating anything from a small cozy accessory to a big bold statement piece the full pattern will go live on ravelry on 1/25/2020 but this introduction will help you make some choices about your materials and design options check out our youtube channel super bulky 1 for more information about our crochet along 1 https //youtu be/nhirva-gsmg
